      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-fc3c-431e-2f5f-583cfcd072b2#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A 2. évezredi asszír művészet</string>
            <string language="en">assyrian art in the second millenium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">assyrian kunst im zweiten millenium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art assyrien dans le deuxième millénaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte assyrian no segundo millenium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte assyrian nel secondo millenium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">assyrian τέχνη στη δεύτερη χιλιετία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte asirio en el segundo millenium</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A 2. évezredi asszír művészet legfontosabb területeinek és emlékeinek bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of the most important fields and memories of the assyrian art in the second millenium</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">asszír,  Assur,  Kár-tukulti-Ninurta,  dombormű,  </string>
            <string language="en">assyria, Assur, Kar-tukulti-Ninurta, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung vom wichtigsten fängt und 
Speicher der assyrian kunst im zweiten millenium auf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des zones et des mémoires les plus
importantes de l'art assyrien dans le deuxième millénaire</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação dos campos e das memórias os mais 
importantes da arte assyrian no segundo millenium</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione dei campi e delle memorie più 
importanti di arte assyrian nel secondo millenium</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των σημαντικότερων πεδίων και των μνημών 
της assyrian τέχνης στη δεύτερη χιλιετία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de los campos y de las memorias 
más importantes del arte asirio en el segundo millenium</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">assyria, Assur, Kar-tukulti-Ninurta, Prägung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">assyria, Assur, Kar-tukulti-Ninurta, foulage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">assyria, Assur, Kar-tukulti-Ninurta, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">assyria, Assur, Kar-tukulti-Ninurta, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">assyria, Assur, καρ-τuκuλτη- Ninurta, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">assyria, Assur, Kar-tukulti-Ninurta, repujado</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
